```{r load in data}
menu <- read.csv("menu.csv",stringsAsFactors = FALSE) %>% 
  mutate(
    Image_HTML = paste0(
    '<img src = "', image, '" width = "100"/>'
    )
  )
```

## Chek out the menu!
```{r menu display}
menu_display <- menu %>% 
  select(
    'ğŸ±Dish name' = dish_name,
    'ğŸ½ï¸category' =category,
    'ğŸ–type' = diet_type,
    'Reilly liking level' = reilly_liking_degree,
    'Nora liking level' = nora_liking_degree,
    'Description' = description,
    'ğŸŒ¶ï¸spicy level '=  spicy_level,
    'image' = Image_HTML
  )

  menu_display,
  filter = 'top',
  escape = FALSE,
  selection = 'multiple',
  options = list(
```
